      • getUsers

        java.util.ArrayList<User> getUsers()
        Returns:

      • getUserManager

        UserManager getUserManager()
        Returns:

      • addUser

        void addUser(User user)
             throws NEGuestsNotAllowedException,
                    NEMaxUserLimitException,
                    NEAlreadyInUserManagerException,
                    NEUserDoesNotExistException
        Adds a user to the user manager.
        Parameters:
        user - The user to add.
        Throws:
        NEAlreadyInUserManagerException - User already exists in user manager.
        NEGuestsNotAllowedException - User is a guest and can't be added to room. Can be changed in RoomSettings.
        NEMaxUserLimitException - Room or zone is full.
        NEUserDoesNotExistException

      • removeUser

        void removeUser(User user)
        Removes a user from the user manager.
        Parameters:
        user - The user to remove.
